title: Track Missing Camera Equipment
description: A high-value camera lens is reported missing from a production set. An agent must track its last known location.

tasks.description: Identify the missing lens by its asset tag in the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the specific lens.
Agent finds the lens was last checked out by the second unit camera operator.

tasks.description: Check the production schedule to see where the second unit was filming on that day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the second unit was at the 'downtown alley' location.

tasks.description: Notify the production manager and the second unit operator about the missing lens and its last known location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear and concise notification to the relevant parties.
